items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a set of JSON formatting options from an integer that represents those options.

items.name: static var fragmentsAllowed: JSONSerialization.WritingOptions
items.desc: Specifies that the parser should allow top-level objects that aren’t arrays or dictionaries.

items.name: static var prettyPrinted: JSONSerialization.WritingOptions
items.desc: Specifies that the output uses white space and indentation to make the resulting data more readable.

items.name: static var sortedKeys: JSONSerialization.WritingOptions
items.desc: Specifies that the output sorts keys in lexicographic order.

items.name: static var withoutEscapingSlashes: JSONSerialization.WritingOptions
items.desc: Specifies that the output doesn’t prefix slash characters with escape characters.
